workflows.name: fetchCustomersData

bf9fd503-44f5-4902-a1e5-7bf412c15d05.code:
// In a real application, this would be an API call
// For now, we'll create mock data

// Create a variable to store the customers data if it doesn't exist
if (!variables['customersData']) {
  variables['customersData'] = [];
}

// Generate mock customer data
const mockCustomers = [
  {
    id: '1',
    name: 'John Smith',
    email: 'john.smith@example.com',
    phone: '+1 (555) 123-4567',
    membershipStatus: 'gold',
    totalBookings: 12,

    joinDate: '2022-03-15',
    notes: 'Prefers weekend appointments'

  {

];

// Simulate API loading delay
setTimeout(() => {
  variables['customersData'] = mockCustomers;
}, 500);

workflows.description: Fetch customers data from API and store in customersData variable

interactions.name: Refresh Customers Data
interactions.description: Refreshes the customers data from the API

interactions.name: Update Search Filter
interactions.description: Updates the search filter when the input changes

interactions.name: Update Membership Filter
interactions.description: Updates the membership status filter when selection changes

interactions.name: Update Sort By Filter
interactions.description: Updates the sort by filter when selection changes

interactions.name: Update Sort Order Filter
interactions.description: Updates the sort order filter when selection changes

interactions.name: Open Add Customer Popup
interactions.description: Opens the customer details popup with no customerId to create a new customer

interactions.name: Open Customer Details
interactions.description: Opens the customer details popup when a row is clicked

interactions.name: Edit Customer
interactions.description: Opens the customer details popup in edit mode when the edit action is clicked

en.code: context.component?.props?.['customerId'] ? context.component?.props?.['isEditing'] ? 'Edit Customer' : 'Customer Details' : 'Add New Customer'
context.component?.props?.['customerId'] ? context.component?.props?.['isEditing'] ? 'Edit Customer' : 'Customer Details' : 'Add New Customer'

interactions.name: Update Name Value
interactions.description: Updates the name value in the customer form

interactions.name: Update Email Value
interactions.description: Updates the email value in the customer form

interactions.name: Update Phone Value
interactions.description: Updates the phone value in the customer form

interactions.name: Update Membership Value
interactions.description: Updates the membership status value in the customer form

interactions.name: Update Notes Value
interactions.description: Updates the notes value in the customer form

default.placeholder: Enter additional notes about this customer

interactions.name: Cancel Form
interactions.description: Closes the popup without saving changes

interactions.name: Save Customer
interactions.description: Validates and saves the customer data
